name: Site Survey - Lot 27.pdf
snippet: Complete site survey for Lot 27 including boundary measurements, elevation data, and soil composition analysis.

name: Floor Plan - Custom Home.dwg
snippet: Detailed floor plan drawings for the custom home project including all rooms, dimensions, and architectural features.

name: Foundation Inspection Report.pdf
snippet: Official inspection report for foundation work including compliance verification and any required corrections.

name: HVAC Layout.pdf
snippet: HVAC system layout including ductwork routing, equipment placement, and ventilation specifications.

name: Material Specifications.pdf
snippet: Detailed material specifications for all construction materials including grades, brands, and compliance standards.

name: Electrical Layout.dwg
snippet: Complete electrical layout drawings including circuit plans, outlet locations, and panel schedules.

name: Plumbing Diagram.pdf
snippet: Plumbing system diagram showing pipe routing, fixture connections, and water supply details.

name: Contractor Agreement.pdf
snippet: Signed contractor agreement outlining scope of work, payment terms, and project timeline.

name: Permit Application - Lot 27.pdf
snippet: Building permit application package submitted to city planning department for Lot 27 construction.

name: Structural Engineering Plans.pdf
snippet: Structural engineering calculations and plans for foundation and framing systems.

name: Safety Compliance Checklist.xlsx
snippet: Daily safety compliance checklist for construction site operations and hazard monitoring.

name: Progress Photos - Week 15.zip
snippet: Weekly progress photos documenting construction milestones and site conditions.
